```{r}
library(klaR)
library(e1071)
library(rpart)
library(rpart.plot)
library(caret)
library("reshape2")
```

## Hold Out Method
### 75-25

```{r}
trainIndex <- createDataPartition(iris$Species, p=0.75, list=FALSE)
```


```{r}
irisTrain <- iris[ trainIndex,]
head(irisTrain)
```

```{r}
irisTest  <- iris[-trainIndex,]
head(irisTest)
```


```{r}
dt <- rpart(Species~.,data=irisTrain,method='class')
dt
```
```{r}
rpart.plot(dt)
```

```{r}
predictions <- predict(dt, irisTest,type="class")
predictions
```
```{r}
confusionMatrix(predictions, irisTest$Species)
```

```{r}
cm <- confusionMatrix(predictions, irisTest$Species)$table
iris_melt <- melt(cm)
```


```{r}
ggplot(iris_melt, aes(x = Prediction,
                      y = Reference,
                      fill = value)) +
geom_tile()
```

```{r}
accuracy75<-((sum(diag(cm)))/sum(cm))*100
accuracy75
```

## Cross Validation

```{r}
dtCV = train(Species~.,iris,
                       method = 'J48',
                       trControl=trainControl(method='cv',number = 10))
```


```{r}
dtCV
```

```{r}
predictions <- predict(dtCV, iris)
predictions
```
```{r}

```

## Standardized Classifier
```{r}
standardize = function(x) {
  z <- (x - mean(x)) / sd(x)
  return( z)
}

iris[-c(5)] <- apply(iris[-c(5)], 2, standardize)
head(iris)
```


```{r}
dtStandard = train(Species~.,iris,
                       method = 'J48')
dtStandard
```
```{r}
plot(dtStandard$finalModel)
```


```{r}
predictions <- predict(dtRS, iris)
predictions
```

```{r}
cm <- confusionMatrix(predictions, iris$Species)$table
cm
iris_melt <- melt(cm)
```

```{r}
ggplot(iris_melt, aes(x = Prediction,
                  y = Reference,
                  fill = value))+geom_tile()
```

```{r}
accuracyStandard<-((sum(diag(cm)))/sum(cm))*100
accuracyStandard
```
